paragraphText:
Since 2022, Fresh Greens Landscaping has been dedicated to providing exceptional lawn care throughout Central Arkansas. We started as a pet waste removal service, and have since grown into your go-to solution for all things lawn care and landscaping.
	In a competitive industry, we go the extra mile to earn your trust and loyalty. Our customers always come first because we know that without you, we wouldn't have any lawns to care for!
	What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to quality service, open communication, and reliability. While many lawn care companies make similar promises, we stand by ours â€” 100%. If you're ever unsatisfied with our service, just let us know, and we'll be back out to make it right as soon as possible.
